title: Text Page, "Title Page:  Giacomo Balla, "Progetti Scenici per 'Sintesi Futuriste'" ["Set Designs for 'Futurist Syntheses'"] from "Progetti Scenici Per 'Sintesi Futuriste'" Portfolio", ca. 1980
medium: Letterpress in black ink on cream laid paper
markings: Watermark, across upper and lower edges:  Ingres-Fabriano
description: Title page consisting entirely of text; at upper right corner: Giacomo Balla / Progetti scenici / per "sintesi futuriste" / 1915-1925 and at lower right corner: Edizioni Franca Mancini - Pesaro
